Message.Title: Ebay expected to beat 2012 Q4 earnings...
Message.Msg: After reading numerous reports, Ebay is growing strong with it's mobile services and paypal investment. This is company is keeping up with the times very well and Paypal is currently expanding into retail stores as well as a new payment method.

Topic.Title: Ebay expected to beat 2012 Q4 earnings...

Message.Msg: whisper number is $.72 vs the street of $.69
Any reason why you ask about 49 or 60? Why not 49 or 56? Because the price is 52.5 right now, so 49 or 56 are both the same distance away. 60 is obviously much farther away than 49.
